alert.note: Alert for Haywood; Henderson; Polk; Transylvania (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 6:42PM EDT until July 29 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Transylvania County in western North Carolina... Henderson County in western North Carolina... Southwestern Polk County in western North Carolina... Southeastern Haywood County in western North Carolina... Northern Greenville County in Upstate South Carolina... Northeastern Pickens County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 642 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Hendersonville to 8 miles northwest of Brevard, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Hendersonville, Brevard, Mills River, Flat Rock, Etowah, Slater-Marietta, Mountain Home, Laurel Park, Saluda and Graveyard Fields. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
